item.title: Information Overflow
item.description: Like eating, consuming informations should have a portion. We have limited appetiet, too much eating results into sick stomach, stress. Fear of Missing Out or FOMO, is a kind of anxity that comes from “too much information”. Internet might be the source of this. Why ? Open internet, bring massive, free, and accessible information into socity. Social media, a decendant of internet known as “rich” in information, such as Twitter, Instagram, Tiktok, Youtube.
